name: Teledoc Health, Inc.
description: Teledoc Health, Inc. is a leading telehealth provider that aims to transform the way healthcare is delivered through innovative technology and personalized care. Founded in 2002, Teledoc provides a comprehensive range of virtual healthcare services, including medical consultations, mental health support, and chronic condition management, all accessible through a user-friendly digital platform. The company leverages advanced telecommunication technologies to connect patients with licensed healthcare professionals in real-time, ensuring that quality care is available anytime and anywhere. Teledoc has established partnerships with numerous health plans, employers, and healthcare systems, making its services widely accessible to millions of members. By focusing on preventive care and early intervention, Teledoc aims to improve health outcomes while reducing overall healthcare costs. The company's commitment to innovation has led to the development of various digital health solutions, including AI-driven symptom checkers and integrated health management programs. With a vision to create a healthier world through accessible healthcare, Teledoc continues to expand its service offerings and enhance its technology platform to meet the evolving needs of patients and healthcare providers alike.

seo.meta_title: Teledoc Health, Inc. | Leading Telehealth Provider
seo.meta_description: Explore Teledoc Health, Inc., a leader in telehealth services. Discover innovative virtual care solutions aimed at improving health outcomes.

faq.question: What services does Teledoc offer?
faq.answer: Teledoc offers virtual medical consultations, mental health services, and chronic condition management.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Teledoc?
faq.answer: Jason Gorevic is the CEO of Teledoc Health, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Teledoc headquartered?
faq.answer: Teledoc is headquartered in Purchase, New York, USA.
